description:
A prototype machine developed by the http://anidb.net/ch133226 [Ochs Earth Corporation]. This is one of the "GUND-ARM" mobile suits which adopted the innovative technology known as the GUND FORMAT. It is equipped with a shield made up of swarm weapon systems called GUND-BITs.
Source: Official page
name: XGF-02 Gundam Lfrith
